reporting-org.narrative: AVT-L Association of Victims of Terrorism Lebanon

title.narrative: Psychological support for victims of terrorism and armed groups

description.narrative: Workshops promoting dialogue and sharing experiences. 3 days workshop for 5 mothers and 5 sons or daughters : widows of army victims with their kids. The psychologist coordinates group discussions in the morning while the art-therapist organized art activities in the afternoon in order to help victims express their feelings and regain control of their lives.

participating-org.narrative: AVT-L - Association Libanaise des victimes du terrorisme

activity-date.narrative: 3 days workshop for 9 youth : children of army victims of terrorism: 4 girls and 5 boys. The psychologist coordinates group discussions in the morning while the art-therapist organized art activities in the afternoon in order to help victims express their feelings and regain control of their lives.
